title: In Just that Perfect Moment...
description: Part 2 of The Perfect World Series begins...In a Most Perfect World...Cameron Grayston has finally met the man of her dreams and will soon be married to him. Life could not get any better for her and yet there are other lives within the manor that find themselves in turmoil. One Grayston questions his place in the world while another finds himself thrust into an unexpected new role. A few old friends become family and a few new friends are made. Cameron, at the heart of it all, learns many new things about herself and the husband she barely knows but is already madly in love with. Many twists and turns await the residents of Grayston Manor as they all search for just that perfect moment...
author: Samantha L. Hardison
